extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusions: MATH226, 231, 232 and MATH237.  Prerequisite of APSC171 and APSC172 and APSC174 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.

basic.description: First order differential equations, linear differential equations with constant coefficients, and applications, Laplace transforms, systems of linear equations. (42/0/0/0/0)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Ordinary Differential Equation
